body: Since my unbanning (3 days ago) I was happy to finally come back and play the variety of gamemodes Avicus had to offer. Sadly all that's left is Nebula. I would like to ask staff to hold Events on other game modes to get them active again. Maybe Double XP. Tournaments. Because I like working on a team to win, but not all the time. Like Elimination I know this was BIG. now it's just dead, Please staff do something to bring back the gamemodes!
body_tagged: Since my unbanning (3 days ago) I was happy to finally come back and play the variety of gamemodes Avicus had to offer. Sadly all that's left is Nebula. Like Elimination I know this was BIG. now it's just dead, Please staff do something to bring back the gamemodes!
title: Staff PLEASE read.

replies.body: I believe you can hold you own events/gatherings to play a gamemode (correct me if I'm wrong)
replies.body_tagged: I believe you can hold you own events/gatherings to play a gamemode (correct me if I'm wrong)

replies.body:
We are aware of this. In the near future, we will be having an update called the "Omega Update".
In this update, we'll be adding "CTW" and "Survival Games", which will hopefully bring the server more players and therefore get those gamemodes more active again.

And to add on to what LeafeonMessiah said, you can hold your own events, but the Event Committee is in charge of hosting big events.

If you would like to have an Elimination (or any other gamemode) event, you may organize one, although it would be best to leave that to the event committee, so you may contact anyone on the committee with any ideas that you may have,
replies.body_tagged:
We are aware of this. In the near future, we will be having an update called the "Omega Update".
In this update, we'll be adding "CTW" and "Survival Games", which will hopefully bring the server more players and therefore get those gamemodes more active again.

And to add on to what LeafeonMessiah said, you can hold your own events, but the Event Committee is in charge of hosting big events.

If you would like to have an Elimination (or any other gamemode) event, you may organize one, although it would be best to leave that to the event committee, so you may contact anyone on the committee with any ideas that you may have,
